about.title: About
about.subtitle: I build production-grade systems end-to-end — from architecture and APIs to CI/CD and cloud deployments.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Production-deployed platforms with real users and real-world constraints.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Open to full-time and internship opportunities. Let's connect.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Share the role, timeline, and what you’re looking for…
contact.rateLimited: Too many messages — try again in {seconds}s.
contact.hint: This form emails me directly and is rate-limited to prevent abuse.

holiday.title: I’m away for Christmas
holiday.subtitle: To save costs, I’ve configured my servers to automatically shut down during the holiday. If you need a live demo temporarily turned on, email me. In the meantime, each project’s GitHub README contains the full details.
holiday.contactBody: Email me which project you want to review and I can bring it back online for you.
holiday.githubBody: Every repository has a detailed README (features, architecture, deployment, and usage).
holiday.note4: Live demos return after the holiday (or on request)
holiday.hint: Thanks for understanding — email me anytime if you need access.

visits.title: Site Stats
visits.subtitle: Total visits and fish coins collected across all visitors.
visits.detailsHint: Visits increment once per page load (JS-enabled). Fish coins increment by +1 for each fish caught. /visits is excluded from visits.

footer.builtWith: Built with Next.js + Tailwind, deployed with love for production.

resume.pdfHint: Tip: put your PDF at public/resume.pdf
